title: Signs you've been playing League too much
body: Today I saw that I had $16.00 dollars in my wallet and thought "I can buy a {{item:1058}} "

replies.body: The other day I was about to cross a particularly busy street and the traffic just kept coming so I caught myself thinking, "I should just press F and Flash across the street, np."

You're an f flasher, huh?

We d flashers despise you.

> [{quoted}](name=trexmixG,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=To6fe1RY,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2014-12-15T00:02:20.094+0000)
> You're an f flasher, huh?
> 
> We d flashers despise you.

the feeling is mutual
D for flash, F for Fire!

D IS DEMISE, F IS FLASH. 

Demise=everything except flash.

D is for Distance, F is for F You. Ignite, Heal, Barrier, Exhaust and Smite are all "F You" summoner spells.

D equates to Flash, Teleport and Ghost. If you take two, D is reserved for whichever covers the greater distance. As such, there are occasions where Flash is on either D or F.
F is for flash so I can put ignite on and hand out the D all day
Naaah. D is for DODGE!
F stands for {{summoner:4}} !!!!
D stands for Don't waste time, which means {{summoner:12}}. F stands for Fire, so {{summoner:14}}.

but Im a jungler.. smite is f and ignite is D...
and flash D...
and exhaust is D...

 D: what have I done

When we were reading "The Great Awakening" in lit class, I did a presentation and said *Shadow Isles* instead of *Grand Isles* and my friend was cracking up and I didn't realize what was wrong until he told me afterwards.
When League slang and words slip into my vocab.....it makes me sick

> [{quoted}](name=Hudson Gaga,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=To6fe1RY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-14T21:08:04.840+0000)
> When League slang and words slip into my vocab.....it makes me sick

I once screamed out "FOCUS SAM" during a soccer game. The other team had a player named Sam and he was easily their best. My friend who also plays League asked me when I sat back down on the bench "Did you really just say that?", and then I had realized what I had done.
FOCUS SAM! HES THE CARRY OF THE GAME!
lmfao that mustve been awkward

> [{quoted}](name=Hudson Gaga,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=To6fe1RY,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-12-14T21:08:04.840+0000)
> When League slang and words slip into my vocab.....it makes me sick

this is very true. I almost said "Gee Gee" to my friend after I won a tennis match. It was so scary

> [{quoted}](name=Volcrian,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=To6fe1RY,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2014-12-14T23:20:30.290+0000)
> this is very true. I almost said "Gee Gee" to my friend after I won a tennis match. It was so scary

My friends get a kick out of it every time I tell them "Gee Gee" in both a pleasant and super sarcastic manner. Should I be worried about them as well?

When my boyfriend and I started dating, people would ask if we were a thing, and one time I accidentally said, "yeah, we're duo." 

._.
Aww, it's okay, it's not *too* far off, in a sense it's true.  And if you're also a real duo in league (which I'd hope you are), it's even cuter!

> [{quoted}](name=Serving Justus,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=To6fe1RY,comment-id=00160000,timestamp=2014-12-16T06:07:06.852+0000)
>
> Aww, it's okay, it's not *too* far off, in a sense it's true.  And if you're also a real duo in league (which I'd hope you are), it's even cuter!

He's one of the few I'll duo with in ranked! I taught him how to support, and he's now branched off to jungling and mid. I'm a proud girlfriend. :D
Went to a birthday party... Asked: "what level are you? "

My friend said that her life was complete and she could die happy.

I said Chronoshift.
I hear game sounds when I'm not playing. Sometimes I hear the ambient music, sometimes I hear an item being purchased. I can even hear the announcer saying "An Ally Has Been Slain".
P.T.S.D- happens all the time in war .__.

> [{quoted}](name=WolfBV,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=To6fe1RY,comment-id=000c,timestamp=2014-12-15T06:55:33.737+0000)
>  I can even hear the announcer saying "An Ally Has Been Slain".

Followed by the stream of 'tick-tick-tick-tick-tick"  sounds of your team spamming the chat arguing.
There is no such thing as "too much League."
yep, it's the biggest sign^
I was sitiing at my desk at work (I'm a risk manager) when I looked down and noticed my left hand fingers were on the QWER keys. Dear god!
i totally forgot about that. my left hand defaults to qwer all the time
you make champion name based puns then remember that no one else gets them and become disappointed
Yeah while making a presentation and some one says that's guaranteed i feel like saying thats garenteed.

> [{quoted}](name=Applesaucey,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=To6fe1RY,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2014-12-15T00:07:15.813+0000)
> 

Words of wisdom right there.
i was driving in my car and thought "goddamn i wish i could give my car a Phantom Dancer so i could avoid unit collision and speed home."
I'm still curious as to "what" tastes purple!{{champion:117}}

Your tears.
You blood.
Your soul.

Teemo gets all the credit because he just kills people outright in a fight.
Lulu like to *"play"* with her victims first. :D
During the summer, when at a beach. If I see someone carrying a super soaker, I instantly see them as Graves for some reason, before realizing I am insane.
See LOL in text. Think league of legends before laugh out loud
I recite many champion's lines, especially Jinx, Lulu, and Veigar's.
Is that a short joke?!
I walked up to a woman in a two piece and said " i know its mating season" {{champion:76}}
i tried to give a warning ping to this car that was drifting into the lane and getting real close to me instead of honking the horn {{summoner:3}}
I try and swipe my mouse when in full screen while watching long continuous league matches to get a better view... even though i cant D:
I keep pressing 1 to Zhonya in other games, out of habit. It never works. :(

I wrote a whole [guide to understanding the dynamics of bottom](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/tips-tricks/64VFYEZy-a-guide-to-understanding-the-dynamics-of-bot-lane) lane as I grew tired of having adc/supports who didn't know what they were supposed to do.
...I need to play more so I can think that too .__.
you start getting a paycheck from RIOT

Thick bushes scare the shit out of you.

{{champion:86}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:86}}
